sentences.english: In the intensive care unit, beam aunt continue to talk to her mother that year.
sentences.chinese: 重症病房裏，梁大媽繼續跟馬母說着當年的事。

sentences.english: Analysis of harmonic response of unconstrained damped plate based on randomness of viscoelastic damping layer;
sentences.chinese: 本文用諧波增量平衡法分析縱橫向耦合梁的諧波響應。

sentences.english: The technology of line reinforced by the temporary beam in the D pattern and container bridge jacking has been widely applied.
sentences.chinese: 型便梁加固線路頂進箱橋施工技術已得到廣泛應用。

sentences.english: Only a handful of bridges have major support beams made from them.
sentences.chinese: 只有少數橋樑採用纖維增強塑料的主體支撐梁。

sentences.english: The roof was supported by a comparatively traditional post-and-beam system.
sentences.chinese: 建築屋頂由相對傳統的後梁系統支撐。

sentences.english: The design of crane rail beam.
A finger or stylus interrupts the light beams and position is determined on the grid.
sentences.chinese: 一隻手指或者尖筆打斷輕的梁，位置是決定閘極欄。

sentences.english: In this paper, the technique and calculation of beams strengthened by prestressing method are studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了用預應力法加固梁的工藝和計算。

sentences.english: The mathematical models of the vibration of beams are given by fourth-order boundary value problems.
sentences.chinese: 四階邊值問題給出了梁振動的數學模型。

sentences.english: Cover is generally inclined beams, the hinged roof beams and between the base.
sentences.chinese: 掩護梁一般是傾斜的，鉸接在頂梁和底座之間。

sentences.english: The beam motion is divided into two parts: rigid rotation and flexible vibration.
sentences.chinese: 假設梁的運動由剛性迴轉與柔性振動兩部分組成。

sentences.english: The generalized active forces of the beam are applied forces of the moving support and elastic forces of the beam.
sentences.chinese: 梁的廣義主動力取爲動支承的作用力和彈性力。

sentences.english: The girders preferably have a height equal to have the distance between each girder.
sentences.chinese: 最好的梁有高度等於有每個梁之間的距離。

sentences.english: The cylindrical normal contact between a rotational flexible body and a fixed cylindrical groove was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究作旋轉運動的柔性梁的線接觸正碰撞問題。

sentences.english: By chance, a fellow practitioner introduced me to Professor Leung Ting.
sentences.chinese: 在偶然的情況下，有位教練介紹了梁挻教授給我認識。

sentences.english: This paper also analyzes the cost and key technological measures for steel carrying pole method.
sentences.chinese: 總結了鋼扁擔梁更換支座的關鍵技術措施。

definition: Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers

surname Wei/name of vassal state of Zhou dynasty from 661 BC in Shanxi, one of the Seven Hero Warring States/Wei state, founded by Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1], one of the Three Kingdoms after the Han dynasty/the Wei dynasty 221-265/Wei prefecture and Wei county at different historical periods
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
